resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Start of Route - this is showed in every route as an indicator where the route starts.
End of Route - this is showed in every route that means it is the end ouf route.
Route Path - the whole route of every PUV is presented with color red line.
Walk Path - this means user needs to walk to get into the route where PUV will pass.
Map Maker Point - this can only be used by admin in adding routes; this marker is used in pointing a route.
Destination Marker - this marker will be seen by users after they specified their destination.
